supportDesc.desc: Describe the writing material in detail using the provided fields.

valItem.desc: The object is composed of parchment or vellum
The object is composed of any kind of paper. Give more details, if any, in a child support element.
The object is composed of papyrus.
The object is composed of palm leaves.
The object is composed of a combination of paper and parchment. The nature of the combination should be specified in the support element.
The object is composed of another material (e.g. wood).
The material of which is object is composed is not known.
signals that the application's default white-space processing modes are acceptable アプリケーションがデフォルトで持つ空白文字類処理モードが有効であることを知らせる。
indicates the intent that applications preserve all white space アプリケーションがすべての空白文字類を保持するという意図を示す。

support.desc: This element contains descriptions of the writing material in various child elements.

note.desc: Add observations on fields mentioned above.

watermark.desc: contains a word or phrase describing a watermark or similar device.

valItem.desc: signals that the application's default white-space processing modes are acceptable アプリケーションがデフォルトで持つ空白文字類処理モードが有効であることを知らせる。
indicates the intent that applications preserve all white space アプリケーションがすべての空白文字類を保持するという意図を示す。

origPlace.desc: Look up the place records. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. The place given here refers to the writing material (and not the production of the copy).

origDate.desc: Fill in the date in CE. The date given here refers to the writing material (and not the production of the copy).

extent.desc: Provide total number of folios and measurements. Base your observations on folios and not pages or bifolios.

foliation.desc: Distinguish between foliation and pagination. Describe the numbering system (Arabic numerals, Hebrew letters etc.). If necessary create multiple fields for different numbering systems exhibited.

collation.desc: Supply information on quiring and catchwords. For additional observations use the free text box.

note.desc: Add observations on fields mentioned above.

formula.desc: Specify the number of bifolia per quire. Describe deviations from the general quiring model (shortened or enlarged quires) in the free text box. You can link to VizColl for detailed description and visualisation of quire structure.

catchwords.desc: Describe the means used to ensure the order of quires.

valItem.ident: Catchwords at the end of quires
Catchwords at the end of folios
Catchwords at the end of pages
Signatures at the end of quires
Signatures at the beginning of quires

condition.desc: Describe the general state of conservation.

note.desc: Add observations on fields mentioned above.

ab.desc: Describe the general state of legibility or conservation of the writing / ink. If only particular areas are damaged, specify so in the note field.
